name: SkillSonics India
tag_list: swiss-vet, swiss-training, technician-training, hard-skills-training, worker, workmen-training, apprenticeship, vocational-training, worker-productivity, work-skills
overview:
SkillSonics enhances competitiveness of customer companies by imparting global level skills to their entry-level and existing technicians. Our vocational courses draw from Swiss content and pedagogy. The Swiss Vocational Education and Training (VET) model produces skilled workers who are considered to be the backbone of Switzerland’s thriving economy and competitive strength.

SkillSonics has forged exclusive partnerships with Swiss bodies – The Sector Organization of the Swiss Mechanical and Electrical Manufacturing Industries (SWISSMEM) and Swiss Federal Institute for Vocational Education and Training (SFIVET), to adapt the Swiss VET model to the Indian context.
